display_name: Overall Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at >=2% oxygen desaturation
description: [(total number of apneas and hypopneas associated with >= 2% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hrembp2 + hrop2 + hnrbp2 + hnrop2 + carbp2 + carop2 + canbp2 + canop2 + oarbp2 + oarop2 + oanbp2 + oanop2 ) / slpprdp
